reg_pit.acttitle: North Island-Coast Development Initiative Trust Act
reg_pit.title: North Island-Coast Development Initiative Trust Regions Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 definition of "Central South Island region", paragraph (d) was added by BC Reg 241/2020, effective September 20, 2020.
Section 2 definition of "Central South Island region", paragraph (d) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 37/2021, effective February 16, 2021.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in the Capital Regional District, the Juan de Fuca Electoral Area;
